com.google.marvin.widget
Class TouchGestureControlOverlay

java.lang.Object
  View
      com.google.marvin.widget.TouchGestureControlOverlay

public class TouchGestureControlOverlay
extends View

A transparent overlay which catches all touch events and uses a call back to return the gesture that the user performed.

Nested Class Summary
static class TouchGestureControlOverlay.Gesture
          An enumeration of the possible gestures.
static interface TouchGestureControlOverlay.GestureListener
          The callback interface to be used when a gesture is detected.
